actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to the order of Thursday, March 20, 2025,  the Journal of the proceedings of the Senate was deemed approved to date.
Pursuant to the order of Thursday, March 20, 2025, the morning hour being deemed expired, and the times for the recognition of the two leaders being reserved.
The following transactions of morning business occurred on today.

S.Res. 134 (Sen. Scott, of FL):
        A resolution designating March 15, 2025, as "National Osceola Turkey Day".

        -- Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

PN12-15:
        Michael Faulkender, of Maryland, to be Deputy Secretary of the Treasury

        -- Motion to proceed to executive session to consideration of nomination agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

        -- Cloture motion presented in Senate.


 PN12-25:
        Christopher Landau, of Maryland, to be Deputy Secretary of State

        -- Considered by Senate.

        -- Confirmed by the Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 60 - 31. Record Vote Number: 137 



 PN12-36:
        John Phelan, of Florida, to be Secretary of the Navy

        -- Considered by Senate.

        -- Confirmed by the Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 62 - 30. Record Vote Number: 136
By unanimous consent, on the request of Mr. Thune, at  7:14 p.m., the Senate adjourned, under its order of today, until 10 a.m. tomorrow.
